alert.note: Alert for Jemez Mountains; Northwest Highlands; Santa Fe Metro Area; Upper Tularosa Valley; West Central Highlands; West Central Mountains; West Central Plateau (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 26 at 12:24PM MST until December 26 at 4:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Upper Tularosa Valley, Jemez Mountains, Northwest Highlands, Santa Fe Metro Area, West Central Highlands, West Central Mountains and West Central Plateau. * WHEN...Until 4 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong cross winds on area roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong crosswinds can be expected on northwest-to-southeast oriented roads, including U.S. 84, 285 and 550.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Jemez Mountains; Northwest Highlands; Santa Fe Metro Area; Upper Tularosa Valley; West Central Highlands; West Central Mountains; West Central Plateau
